member.name: T:Cognex.DataMan.SDK.Discovery.EthSystemDiscoverer
member.summary: Discovers ethernet-based DataMan systems.

member.name: M:Cognex.DataMan.SDK.Discovery.EthSystemDiscoverer.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the EthSystemDiscoverer class.

member.name: M:Cognex.DataMan.SDK.Discovery.EthSystemDiscoverer.Finalize
member.summary: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.

member.name: M:Cognex.DataMan.SDK.Discovery.EthSystemDiscoverer.Discover
member.summary: Discovers systems on the network.

member.name: M:Cognex.DataMan.SDK.Discovery.EthSystemDiscoverer.ForceNetworkSettings(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Net.IPAddress,System.Net.IPAddress,System.Net.IPAddress,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Forces a system to adopt certain network settings based on the MAC address of the system.
member.param: MAC address of the system to be forced.
True to enable DHCP on the system, false otherwise.
IP addres to be set on the system.
Subnet mask to be set on the system.
Default gateway to be set on the system.
User name to use for authentication.
Password to use for authentication.
Name of the system
member.remarks: All of the network settings (except for macAddress) are always overwritten. None of the parameters ae optional, they all have to be specified everytime.

member.summary: Sends a message to the specified device to reconfigure its TCP/IP settings to those specified in the parameters.
member.param: The IP address of device to configure
The MAC address of device to configure
An admin username
The password for the specified username
The new host name for the device
True to tell the device to use DHCP
The new IP address for the device if not using DHCP
The new subnet mask for the device if not using DHCP
The new default gateway to use if not using DHCP
The new DNS server to use if not using DHCP
The new domain name for the device if not using DHCP
True to reset all other parameters to factory default settings

member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: P:Cognex.DataMan.SDK.Discovery.SerSystemDiscoverer.SystemInfo.DeviceTypeId
member.summary: Gets the Device Type Id of the discovered system as it is returned by the firmware for the GET DEVICE.ID command. Its value is zero if the firmware does not support the command.
